settings.text: We offer a range of cutting-edge LED sign lamps that are UL and SAM certified, with an IP65 rating. With over 20 years of industry experience, we have identified the areas that needed improvement and developed lamps that address the pain points of sign companies and install technicians. Our goal is to make every sign retrofit job as quick, easy, and efficient as possible.

settings.heading: Rapid Lamps™Generation 2
settings.text:
Experience unparalleled brightness with our patented Generation 2 Rapid Lamps™, meticulously crafted to ensure the swiftest retrofit installation. Offered in packs of 4 and 10, and ranging in sizes from F-18 to F-120, these dual-sided, IP65-rated LED sign tubes are UL & SAM listed. Each package comes with all essential components, ensuring a seamless and straightforward setup.

Each box of our Rapid Lamps™ Generation 2 signtubes contains the selected quantity of sign tubes, accompanied by the appropriate number of accessories including T-connectors, AC input wires, and end caps in safe packaging.

settings.heading: Rapid Lamps™Generation 3
settings.text:
Experience unmatched luminosity with our innovative Generation 3 Rapid Lamps™, exclusively designed for swift and hassle-free Menu Board installations. Available in packs tailored to your needs and varying in sizes from F-36 to F-120, these circular tubes boast two-sided LED illumination, ensuring a broader light spread. With an IP65 rating, these LED sign tubes are not only resilient but also UL & SAM certified. Each set is equipped with all the vital components, guaranteeing an effortless and smooth installation process.

Each box of our Rapid Lamps™ Generation 3 signtubes contains the selected quantity of sign tubes, accompanied by the appropriate number of accessories including T-connectors, AC input wires, and end caps in safe packaging.

settings.heading: Rapid Brackets™and Miscellaneous Products
settings.text:
Illuminate your signage with our comprehensive range of LED accessories. Dive into our collection:

Rapid Brackets™ 10-pack: Designed specifically for our Generation 3 Rapid Lamps™, these brackets ensure a snug fit for your LED tubes. Whether you're building a new sign or replacing old tombstones, our brackets make the installation process seamless.

AC Input Wire 10-pack: Our 10A, 4/8 ft UL Rated AC Input Cables are crafted to provide a safe and efficient connection for your LED installations. UL-rated for quality and safety, each pack equips you with 10 cables, perfect for all your LED signage needs.

T-Connectors 10-pack: Enhance your LED setups with our T-connectors, designed to provide a secure connection between your LED Sign Tubes. Simplify your installation process and ensure a consistent power flow with these connectors.

Upgrade your signage and experience the brilliance of our advanced LED technology and accessories.
